All Classes

Class Description
Bishop
This class is used to have a pattern of all the possible movement for a Bishop
ChessBoard
This class is used to manage all about the ChessBoard
ChessException
Exception class used to contain all the exceptions in our application.
ChessFontManager
Class used to blit some font sprites on the screen, using a string as input.
ChessModel2
This class is used as an interface between the GUI, the Chessboard managing, and the chronometer
Chronometer
This class is used to manage a chronometer and get the game duration for each player
EmptyCellException
Exception used when an action is performed with a position where there is no chess piece.
IChess
Interface used for Oriented-Object Programmming courses.
IChess.ChessColor
Enum used for chess piece colors.
IChess.ChessKingState
Enum used for chess King piece status.
IChess.ChessPosition
Class used for chess piece positions.
IChess.ChessType
Enum used for chess piece types.
IMove
This interface is used to create different movement pattern , using the design pattern Strategy
King
This class is used to have a pattern of all the possible movement for a King, also contain the castling moves
Knight
This class is used to have a pattern of all the possible movement for a Knight
MainLauncher
This is the main class for this Object-Oriented Programming course.
OutOfBoardException
Exception used when an action is performed with a position outside of the chess board.
Pawn
This class is used to have a pattern of all the possible movement for a Pawn
Piece
This class is used to have pieces defined by their color, type and movement pattern
Queen
This class is used to have a pattern of all the possible movement for a Queen
RemovedPiece
this class is used to have the information about removed pieces from each player
Rook
This class is used to have a pattern of all the possible movement for a Rook
